case.state: Last time I was in a place like this, I was training for a different profession! This is a nice change of pace.
You... you're just messing with me, right? I didn't think I'd meet anyone else named "Phoenix."
"Nick?" Huh? Oh, sorry, just ignore me.
Diego? Oh... sorry, I was just reminded of someone. Pay it no mind.
The defense is ready to play.
I'm Mia Fey, attorney at law.
Let's see what you bring to the table.
Hm... something's not right about that redheaded girl...
This table is starting to develop a thick air of mystery.
~Name~, I get it if you don't like me, but you shouldn't be grinding your teeth like that.
Wow, look at us! You'd be forgiven for thinking this was a black tie party!
Shouldn't weapons be discarded at the door? I'm not sure I want to see what happens if you lose.
This table seems like it's going to have a lot of stories to tell.
Something about the look on ~name~'s face tells me I should be watching closely...
Bold to play a game like this wearing so little...
I'm used to work being a boys' club, but I'm feeling really overwhelmed here...
Oh, so this is a girls' night out? That works, but are we still going to...?
Von Karma. Wait, this girl...
Von Karma. Where have I heard that name before?
You say you're a prosecutor? But you look so young...
(Hmm... I've got the chills, but I can't tell why.)
"Lux," that's Latin for "light," right? Then this game is sure to be illuminating! Heh. Sorry, you must get that a lot.
Ms. Pauling, you have the air of a consummate professional.
Pleased to meet you, Ms. Faye. You can call me Ms. Fey! Heh.
All girls except for ~human~? The defense finds this highly suspicious!
I object to Mr. ~human~'s gender! This is unfair!
A-All guys?! Is this a set-up?
This is fine. I'm used to my profession being a boys' club.
I'm ready to kick back for the weekend!
We're playing up here? This went from risque to outright daring!
Oh, so this is a more... intimate game than usual.
The defense is ready to play.
I've got all I need to win.
I have no intention of losing.
I'm feeling fine today!
Excuse me if I speak softly. I was shouting all day at work.
Dealer, ~cards~ cards, please.
I'd like ~cards~ cards.
Give me ~cards~.
One of these cards is giving me a bad feeling...
A conch shell on the back of a card... have to watch out for that.
(H-Hold it! It's all coming back! That trial... has it been this long?)
Well, to answer your question, Mulan, ...yes. Granted, the last time I was able to masturbate as myself, my house was being tapped...
I look away for one moment, and suddenly there's massive flowers covering her!
Isn't there a minimum clothing requirement here? Felicia seems... underdressed.
Regarding your question, I'm... no stranger to it, Sei. Diego and I used to do... a lot together.
Sounds lovely, Sei. I wouldn't mind some sake.
I've got it!
This should be more than sufficient.
I almost never have this good luck!
So you're a magician as well, Joey? Heard of the Magician's Grand Prix? Famous groups like the Gramaryes compete there.
Yes! Safe!
Not this round. Not yet.
I'll turn things around yet!
The turnabout starts now!
I'm back in it!
Don't expect me to just roll over!
We're holding off on the verdict for now.
Go ahead. Try and beat this hand!
Dodged a bullet there.
These cards are as good as my aunt's sweets!
There's no need for me to force a smile now!
I feel like I'm on the verge of a Not Guilty verdict!
(H-Hold it! It's all coming back! That trial... has it been this long?)
Well, to answer your question, Mulan, ...yes. Granted, the last time I was able to masturbate as myself, my house was being tapped...
I look away for one moment, and suddenly there's massive flowers covering her!
Isn't there a minimum clothing requirement here? Felicia seems... underdressed.
Regarding your question, I'm... no stranger to it, Sei. Diego and I used to do... a lot together.
Sounds lovely, Sei. I wouldn't mind some sake.
Not too sure on this.
I can handle this.
Could be worse, honestly.
So you're a magician as well, Joey? Heard of the Magician's Grand Prix? Famous groups like the Gramaryes compete there.
Please be enough.
I hate leaving my fate to chance...
I'm fine!
Is it too late to try bluffing?
Well, at least I haven't reached Ms. Byrde's level of luck yet.
I can do this. I've turned around tougher situations before.
(H-Hold it! It's all coming back! That trial... has it been this long?)
Well, to answer your question, Mulan, ...yes. Granted, the last time I was able to masturbate as myself, my house was being tapped...
I look away for one moment, and suddenly there's massive flowers covering her!
Isn't there a minimum clothing requirement here? Felicia seems... underdressed.
Regarding your question, I'm... no stranger to it, Sei. Diego and I used to do... a lot together.
Sounds lovely, Sei. I wouldn't mind some sake.
Am I missing something?
There's gotta be something I can use...
Think, Mia, think...
I've played Phoenix before. I'm used to bad hands...
So you're a magician as well, Joey? Heard of the Magician's Grand Prix? Famous groups like the Gramaryes compete there.
Gotta think outside the box on this one.
Is this the end?
Stick a fork in me, I'm done.
I need a miracle...
Is this how it ends?
It's like the prosecution just "updated" the autopsy report...
I haven't played with such a bad hand since my first trial.
No matter how you try to hide it, the truth will always reveal itself!
Really, I just wanted to unwind. Something about this place looked like it would be a good place to cool off. It kind of has a pull to it, doesn't it? It's almost... magnetic.
That reminds me, Maya's probably going to want fast food again...
Hm... I'll probably just review some cases. I don't think I have any hearings or depositions tomorrow. At least, I hope not...
Oh, I've seen some ghosts all right. Just none quite like... that.
The U.S. abandoning jury trials has had a staggering effect on its legal system. Makes me wonder how there were ever enough votes for that.
I've heard stories about a Japanese attorney who dazzled the English courts. What was his name? Naru...
I'm a criminal defense attorney, so gallows humor is how I cope. That said, I think company dictates what subject matter is acceptable for jokes.
*Sigh* I could use some coffee.
I'm not picky, but Maya... burgers or ramen, she eats almost nothing else.
Eating is prohibited in the courtroom. Which makes me wish I didn't skip breakfast.
Oh, I enjoy classical music. I once thought about taking piano lessons.
I don't do products liability, but I think I can give you a referral.
In my experience, only troublemakers wear masks. What are you up to, young lady?
She's wearing a mask... You're not some kind of thief, are you?
So, uh, you're a robot, Mettaton? The progress of technology is amazing.
I'm very curious about who designed your dress, Mettaton.
My cousin Pearl is a darling little thing, just like her namesake.
I get it. I have to move when I articulate, too.
Oh, I absoultely adore... uh, what was it called, again? I have a big poster and everything, but what was that title?
I wandered in after work one evening, thinking I was just going to get a drink from a local dive. At least, I think I did. It's a little hard to remember, strangely.
I'm told a lot of lawyers like to play golf, but I never had the patience for it.
You'll have to teach me your secrets, ~leader~.
If you're looking for someone to blame for the way this game is going, just ask "qui bono?" That means you should suspect ~leader~.
~Leader~ sure seems confident. Pride cometh before the fall, in my experience.
~Leader~ is on top right now, but isn't it more fun to root for the underdog?
If there's one thing I like, it's people who stay in control of the situation, ~leader~.
Is ~leader~ really that far ahead? Still?
~Leader~ seems like they've had this figured out from the beginning.
~Leader~ is grinning like that prosecutor did when he had a trick up his sleeve. I don't like it.
Say, ~leader~, how would you feel about giving the rest of us a two-round recess?
I feel like I haven't seen much evidence from ~leader~ yet. Shall we change that?
Hey May, if you saw a wild Pokemon first and were ready to catch it, but someone else caught it in a Pokeball first, which of you has the right to it?
I hear you've had run-ins with criminals from time to time, May, but who enforces the law in Hoenn? Is it the gym leaders?
Ms. Ayano, it sounds like you're very persistent about looking for someone... Be careful, stalking is a crime.
Your uniform... are you old enough to be in here, Ms. Ayano?
I think I'm seeing an angel! ...Seriously, though, what's with that getup, Doctor?
Sorry. Court procedure is usually pretty dull. It's not like on TV.
It's true that juries are imperfect, but that's also what makes them so effective. They bring a common sensibility to court proceedings that is sometimes forgotten in the cold absolutism of the law.

If I remember the story right, he traveled far from his home as a student to defend the honor of his best friend, shaking up the English view of Japanese culture and rules of evidence in the process. I hear he even worked alongside the famous Detective Sherlock Holmes!
It's tough to stop a lie once it's spread. We can only try to counter it with the truth.
"All-seeing demon?" I'm not, but it might help my career if I was.
A highly perceptive demon, clad in red, with fierce, sharp horns...
Strip poker? Or just poker in general? Either way, the answer is "yes." How many times? That's a secret.
I don't know about killing, but if we're talking monsters, I could mention a certain redhead...
If he were wearing a suit, I'd get it, but...
Haru? Haru Okumura? Didn't I hear someone refer to you as a "Phantom Thief?"
Futaba Sakura, I've read your profile. Does the name "Medjed" mean anything to you?
Isn't there a Futaba among that group called the Phantom Thieves? That wouldn't happen to be you, would it?
I have a nagging urge to protect and care for you, Futaba. Sorry, is that strange?
Zone-tan... I don't think I've seen your name before, but I get a dangerous feeling, looking at you.
Maybe I'm assuming too much, but you look frustrated by something, Lux.
You seem to want to believe in people, Lux. That's a good quality, but people will say you're naive and vulnerable for it.
Forgive my saying so, Lux, but you don't seem very experienced with games of... this nature.
You remind me so much of my little sister...
You look exhausted, Ms. Pauling. You must work in a competitive field.
I'm used to referring to clients by their last names, Ms. Pauling, but you're the first to insist upon it. Is there a reason for that?
Phoenix always wears blue, and that stuck-up prosecutor loved red... Ms. Pauling, how do you feel about coordinating colors with your coworkers?
Ms. Pauling, would you be interested in working for the Fey & Co. Law Offices? I promise you'll be well compensated.
Your boss is lucky to have such a dedicated assistant, Ms. Pauling.
Ms. Corrin, I hear you have difficulty making decisions. Maybe I can help--I am called a "counselor," after all.
Heh. With your hair, you remind me a lot of Maya.
I hear you can revive the dead, Dr. Ziegler. That'd be useful in my cases!
The short one in the green tunic... My gut is telling me he's trouble.
I sense that we might have a pro at the table. Something about the way you hold your cards, Faye...
(That move... I should watch to see if Faye is keeping cards up her sleeve.)
Everything okay, Faye? You seem like you're panicking about something.
(Faye comes across cold as ice. Someone like that has got to be hiding something significant.)
Forgive me for saying so, Faye, but you look like someone who might need my services.
Happy Valentine's Day, everyone! I guess this is where we're taking our romantic exploits today, huh?
Must be nice to fight crime when you don't have to obey the law yourself...
Marceline, you're blue! It's not that cold in here, is it?
My, what big teeth you have, Marceline.
It looks like Marceline is... floating. Maybe I should slow down on the drinks.
Look at us, Angela: a lawyer and a doctor, and we still ended up in a place like this!
Say Doctor, how much would you charge to be an expert medical witness? Or to perform an autopsy? It'd be great to have that kind of expertise in my pocket.
Have you ever seen a patient write a dying message in their blood, Doctor? You wouldn't believe how often that comes up...
Hm... sorry, I'm trying to figure out how to address you, Mettaton. Do you have a gender? Or a last name?
Sorry to be blunt, but what does a robot even get out of a game like this?
I've gathered that you're some kind of TV actor, Mettaton. What sort of show is it? Is it like that Steel Samurai thing Maya likes?
Sometimes I skip meals because my stomach is too tied up in knots from my cases. That's a joke. Mostly.
Ever thought of practicing law, ~human~? We could use more confident ladies in the courtroom!
Isn't it a little dangerous playing out in the street like this? I don't think the thrill is worth it.
Did the rest of you have to sign an NDA before you came in here?
The time difference between Paris and Los Angeles is nine hours. I know that off the top of my head because of a particular case...
The evening air on a rooftop... it really gets your blood pumping, huh?
I wouldn't say I'm afraid of heights, but I really don't want to think about falling from up here...
Does anyone else hear an accordion? Or is that my imagination?
I'd like to eat a high-class meal prepared by a classically trained French chef. J'aimerais ça tres bien!
You can feel the history coming off these streets. Like they're casting magic on us!
You know, "The Thinker" was sculpted by a Frenchman: Auguste Rodin. That statute... well, never mind.
A strip poker game on the roofs of Paris... this is a classy night out for sure.
All this amazing food made by world-class chefs, and Maya will still probably want a burger.
The defense has all we need to end this case.
Maya and I were still pretty young when our mother left us. Did any of you have to leave home early?
I think I forgot to call Maya today. I'll do it after this.
You know, Kurain Village doesn't look like any other town in California. I wonder why that is.
I have high expectations for Phoenix. He's come a long way since we first met.
None of you are bluffing about your hands? That's unusual.
I bet ~human~ has a... no, Mia. Objection, speculation.
It's way too late to cook, so it'll be either delivery or leftovers for dinner.
Watch out, I've got an ace waiting! Kidding. Or am I?
I'll call Phoenix and tell him I'm coming in late tomorrow.
If only I could ask Diego to drive me home.
Well, it's obvious what kind of hand ~human~ has.
If any of you need representation, I have business cards on me.
Think it through, Mia. You can't afford to lose this one.
If I just turn my thinking around...
One last ace...!
I thought it was warm in here, but now...
Sigh... I can feel the drinks catching up to me.
Let's hope this round goes a little better.
This hasn't been ideal, but I'm not out of it yet.
I'm not about to give in just because I've taken a few penalties.
Ini Miney. Tell me. Have we met?
So you do know the Fey Clan.
Oh? They love me? How nice of them to say that.
Are you... trying to do something illegal?
I have a slew of good cases, Ms. Chen... but nothing ever came close to the time I got Phoenix a "not guilty."
Funny. I find witnesses tend to be the quirky ones.
I've had my share of long nights, yes.
I have not. My clients tend to not be very tech-savvy.
Single? I suppose I am now.
I can't say I've ever heard the term.
Do you really want to know? It's bad. My client... comitted suicide, there in the courtroom.
You flatter me, Cynthia. But yes, the two of us make this dive look like a cabaret!
Heh. I've always thought about what I'd say to the people who wrote the laws I have to work with. How hard was it for "Prince Shoutoku" to come up with those laws?
Sometimes even professional ladies need to take a night to unwind, Nami.
Sure. I'll give you a business card. If someone answers the phone in a silly voice, it'll just be my sister, Maya.
Oh, that makes it sound so grand... W-Wait, I didn't consent to my image being broadcast in any kind of show!
Oh, I haven't channeled anyone in a long time. I miss training in the village a bit, but my job gives me plenty of new rigors to focus on.
Sure. I think we could come up with some creative arguments about whether robots can possess criminal intent.
Well, I'm not married. There is someone, but... He's stuck somewhere between life and death, so I'm afraid my channeling wouldn't be any use.
Hm... maybe a sufficiently handsome ghost...
Agh... Not how I'd like to start things off.
I lost... this is a bitter feeling.
No rebuttal at this time, Your Honor.
Ah, they're going to see...
So much for my dignity.
Well, since we're swapping phrases... "No, that's wrong!"
Why yes Futaba, I am- no, was a lawyer.
You see, a lawyer is someone who fights evil with words instead of weapons. Your world could learn a lot from lawyers.
Oh... uh... thank you Sei?
To be honest, this is nothing compared to some of the witnesses I've seen over the years. You'd probably pull your hair out, Seven.
How would you know that, Mr. Pit? Unless... are you here to take me to heaven or whatever?
It was foolish to think I would make it unscathed.
Oh.
Fortunes can turn around in an instant in the courtroom.
Damn. Looks like I was on the wrong track that time.
No! I thought I had it!
I know I shouldn't worry yet, but...
With this large a lead, I'm not even mad.
Don't get too excited. I'm just getting started!
This scarf isn't great for sitting around casually, anyway.
I can handle a little setback or two.
Don't worry Mia, everyone else is in more dire straights.
I'm not worried. I've still got the upper hand.
That wasn't the right move. I'll have to rethink things.
Fair's fair, even if I don't like it.
Bringing me down to your level, huh?
It's fine. I'm still in control of things.
W-Well, at least I won't be alone.
Even still, I won't back down!
Imagining you naked isn't going to calm my nerves this time.
No, wait! There is, uh, a clear...contradiction here?
W-Wait! Give me another chance, please!
Tops down, bottoms up, I guess.
Well, since we're swapping phrases... "No, that's wrong!"
Why yes Futaba, I am- no, was a lawyer.
Oh... uh... thank you Sei?
To be honest, this is nothing compared to some of the witnesses I've seen over the years. You'd probably pull your hair out, Seven.
How would you know that, Mr. Pit? Unless... are you here to take me to heaven or whatever?
I'm up?
Let's do it!
It has to be me, huh?
Alright, alright.
I almost want to take my scarf off.
I haven't always worn this scarf, but my cousin told me it was a good look.
Shame my experience hasn't helped me at all.
But if I ditch my magatama, I won't be able to see when you're all lying! Just kidding.
I'm running low on options.
This isn't going the way I'd hoped...
I'm not in the worst shape, but I could still use a turnabout.
I object to this!
I thought things were going all right, but...
Rats. Well, I'll do it, but I'm not going to like it.
No, wait! There is, uh, a clear...contradiction here?
I-I'm not done! I still have more evidence!
Objection overruled, huh?
I've squared off against criminals before. This is nothing.
Well, since we're swapping phrases... "No, that's wrong!"
Why yes Futaba, I am- no, was a lawyer.
Oh... uh... thank you Sei?
To be honest, this is nothing compared to some of the witnesses I've seen over the years. You'd probably pull your hair out, Seven.
How would you know that, Mr. Pit? Unless... are you here to take me to heaven or whatever?
I'll test the waters, I guess.
Not the best start.
I'm used to starting on the back foot.
This is not going well.
I'm sensing a bad pattern here.
I think I'm sweating already...
I can't believe I dressed up in my old suit for this.
Not much left to hide behind.
All my evidence is getting thrown out!
Jeez, even my trials never go this poorly.
Hold it! This can't be right!
I think I need to reconsider how I spend my time.
I-I should have been more careful.
I have to lose my... I-Is this a nightmare?
This contradicts the evidence! ...You don't seem convinced.
A lawyer is someone who smiles no matter how bad it gets.
This is rock bottom... I guess miracles don't happen.
Because that name was very prominent in my hometown a while ago.
Aren't you the expert? Surely you can figure it out, Ms. Miney.
You know, it's the funniest thing. It triggers automatically when someone is trying to protect a deep, dark secret from me.
For the record, this magatama is able to see a person's secrets...
Try and put me down all you like, Ms. Miney.
Well, that works both ways. But unlike you, this is something I don't mind.
Ow... don't take offense, Miss Koizumi. She meant someone else.
Well, I won't deny them any more. Or perhaps it's mostly you?...
That's... half-right, Aimee.
The Dark Age of the Law affected more than I realized... I'm sorry to hear that, Futaba.
Ah yes. That movie was terrible.
My magatama is going next.
Never thought about that, Zoey.
There's a very good reason for that, Ms. Palutena. It's the truth.
That's right, Sonya.
Anyway, I've seen you all staring at my chest... like a certain redhead over there.
Well, since you've all been ogling my chest like a certain awkward man over there...
That's an interesting thought... What do you make of that,~human~?
An interesting case? I suppose the Redd White case was interesting to gather evidence for. Even if the end result was... less than pleasant.
Don't try and change the subject!
I never regretted that case.
Well, spirit channeling is a major part of some judicial systems.
...To put it bluntly, yes. I'll let you decide which question that yes was for, though.
I'm not really the person to ask for that now. I can redirect you to my agency, though.
Here? That's asking the impossible, Ms. Chen.
Not at all. At least not enough to be categorized under a law.
And just what were you hoping for?
Sometimes even upstanding citizens need lawyers, Nami. You wouldn't believe how many of my clients were in the wrong place at the wrong time.
It's full of spiritual power. Maybe a ghost wants to jump out to meet you! Hehe.
Ah, so it's something like Common Law. It's true, the ideals of long-dead rulers have their influence on even intricate aspects of modern law.
Of course! A lawyer should be confident and collected.
Ah, that's a relief. I'd hate to leave Maya here on such a short notice.
Do you want to share with the room, Ms. Yew?
Oh? And how does Edgeworth know about a thing like this?
Of course, men love my chest more, Meia.
Well, since even the goody-goody cherub has been staring at my chest...
I know you want to see my chest- looking at you Zone-tan!
I always considered it rude to not leave your shoes at the door.
Off they come...
These aren't the best for a place like this, anyway.
I guess it is a bit stuffy, isn't it?
I'm warm enough without my scarf.
You might not have even noticed I was wearing a scarf, huh?
Seems my magatama has to go next. Oh well.
Sorry, mom, but my magatama's gotta go.
I don't think my ancestors wanted to watch this anyhow.
I hoped it wouldn't come to this, but as they say...
Well, it's no fun if I don't have any skin in the game, I guess.
Rules are rules. I did just get this thing dry cleaned, though.
Anyway, I've seen you all staring at my chest...
Can't keep your eyes off my top, right? Well, let's turn your thinking on its head!
You were thinking I'd go for my bra next, right?
Crap.
Alright, this is it. The real deal!
I'll accept my penalty.
(I knew it. She's hiding something. I can see the Psyche-Locks.)
I admit, it's not the most wholesome return in the world, but this was wholly planned and consensual between us.
So, that being said, is there something you'd like to tell me, Ms. Miney?
...And it was going off like crazy near Ms. Miney.
I'll smile through it, no matter how bad it gets.
Afraid? Hardly. I'm just making you work for it.
Just you wait! I'm not cornered yet!
What are you talking about?
Perhaps I can show you my old courtroom tactics later, Sei.
That's more of Maya's forte. I'm just a lawyer.
It's not an uncommon item, Futaba. At least where I'm from.
Have you not picked up on it yet, Hermione? I almost don't want to tell you.
It's not exactly an amulet, but yes, Jasmine. At one point, this was a valuable tool for me.
No, Phoenix does that to himself, usually.
But I'd have to say probably not. We channel the dead, not the undead.
Do you... not like lawyers, Asuna?
A lawyer is someone who smiles, no matter how hard it gets. (And Xander's commentary is only making this harder.)
I wouldn't say bold... more like... turning things around.
Maybe you should, Ms. Song. I think the others would eat it right up.
Don't worry, Ms. Song. There's still plenty of opportunities for you to lose your panties.
I don't think I've quite reached your level yet, Ms. Song.
Uh, don't mention it, Ms. Song.
Then it seems my plan worked out.
Oh... I even threw the detective for a loop? This was more effective than I thought!
You didn't have to point that out, Nugi-chan. Maybe this was a bad idea...
We'll see about that, Miss Goddess of Light.
I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but that's kind of already happened.
(I don't need your love!)
Oh, Videl. If only you knew.
It's not reincarnation, Sonya. Why don't you explain it, ~player~?
A lawyer is someone who smiles, no matter how hard it gets. You must not know very good lawyers, Sonya.
What do you mean, "unhygenic"? If you have a problem, take it up with Maya.
I try.
I'd appreciate if they would keep the comments to themselves.
Slightly more interesting than most, I'd say.
And what if I do?
Never underestimate an attorney.
We're in enough of a financial strait as is...
Oh! Like that! ...Well, I won't turn that down.
...Really? Tell me more...
Are you surprised? My agency handles almost exclusively murder cases.
It's sentimentally valuable, but if you tried to sell it, well... it's worth less than an hour of my time. You know, if you happened to be arrested for theft, for example.
We serve the law, Pit. Of course lawyers are polite!
Do you even wear headbands normally?
Insult me all you want, but do not sully my mother's name. She's suffered enough.
If you want to indict me, you're going to need more solid evidence than that, Ms. Von Karma. Would anyone here admit they're lying, hmm?
Don't you know, Ms. Von Karma? This is when we have our greatest comebacks.
Which is why I'm saving it for last.
Don't worry Nagisa. I know what I'm doing.
Nothing against it!
Whoops, too bad! You'll just have to accept the consolation prize.
That's right, Sonya... I'm not a pushover. I've come back from worse!
And that's exactly why I took off my underwear first.
There we go. Let's continue.
That's almost kind of refreshing. Back to the game.
The floor's a little cold, but I'm just getting started.
Phew, much better.
I don't think my neck will be cold.
That thing is a nightmare when it's windy out.
I gave up the spiritual lifestyle long ago. In a sense, anyway.
Haah...
I don't need spiritual power to tell if you're lying.
A lawyer is someone who smiles no matter how hard it gets.
I feel kind of giddy, despite the situation. Is that strange?
Usually I've had a few more drinks before I get to this point.
Think you've earned a glimpse? Think again!
Gonna have to wait if you want a look at the goods.
Save the best for last, as they say.
Keep it cool, Mia... you're only naked in front of strangers...
I've been subject to dressings-down before, but none quite so literal as this.
My counterargument is threadbare.
This is going to be interesting indeed...
No choice now, ~name~.
Pick something interesting, ~name~.
I won't look if it makes you feel better.
~Name~. You know the rules.
Things are getting good now.
I'm okay with this.
Feeling tense?
Will you pick something big for me?
Okay, ~name~, show it.
Go ahead and take it off, ~name~.
At this stage, a gentleman would make things even...
You've seen me, time to return the favor.
With my current state of dress, I say this is fair.
Show me some due consideration, ~name~.
Off with it, ~name~!
You're up, ~name~!
If you wanted to impress me, now would be the time.
Show me more...
Put on a show...please?
Would you mind taking it off slowly?
Don't stare...don't stare...
